sentences.en: For additional fee, city workers would plant the tree in the renter's yard.
sentences.cn: 市民如果想在过节后将树种在自家的院子里,还需另外交纳相关费用.

sentences.en: He considers himself fortunate to be a renter in the Detroit area, where the “for sale” signs are multiplying.
sentences.cn: 他考虑以后在底特律当一名承租人，因为底特律的“租赁”业正在不断发展。

sentences.en: Homeowner's or renter's insurance primarily covers against loss to your property due to damage or theft.
sentences.cn: 房子的持有者或是租借者的保险主要包括了因为毁坏和盗窃而造成的损失.

sentences.en: If you are a renter and need to make an online inquiry, please click here.
sentences.cn: 如果你是租客,需要填写网上求租信息, 请点击这里.

sentences.en: Once having left the museum, you must buy another ticket to re - renter.
sentences.cn: 一旦离开了博物馆, 你就必须再次买票才能进入.

sentences.en: Renter must meet standard age, driver and credit requirements hour advance reservation required.
sentences.cn: 承租人有效必须符合标准的年龄, 驾驶人和信用的要求.

sentences.en: The renter pays the electric and gas bills.
The renter shall keep the house in a neat orderly state.
sentences.cn: 租赁者要保持房屋整洁有序.

sentences.en: To guarantor, the behavior of renter will become decisive factor it will undertake contingent liability.
sentences.cn: 对于担保人而言,承租人的还款行为直接关系到担保企业本身是否会因为担保行为而承担或有负债.

sentences.en: When the landlord and renter reach an agreement, they sign a contract called a lease.
sentences.cn: 房东与承租者达成协议时, 他们就会签下一纸协定,称作租约.

words.tran_cn: 承租人；佃户；房东；（英）影片出租商

trans.tran_en: a person who lets his property in return for rent, esp a landlord
